Hello, my name is _(mention your name)__. I am here on behalf of the Ministry of Health to conduct a survey in houses within your community about the community drug distribution that was conducted in (mention the month of MDA and show the drugs). We would like to know if the members of your house received and swallowed the drugs. This interview will only take a few minutes. Taking part in the survey/interview will not benefit you directly, but the results will help the Ministry of Health to improve the program. It is your choice to take part, or not to take part, in this survey. You may refuse without penalty.
